mapper.select: SELECT O.OM_CNTNUM,O.OM_NUM,P.P_NO,O.U_CNT,O.M_ID, O.OM_DATE,O.P_PRICE,O.OM_STATE, R.R_CONTENT, P.P_NAME,P.P_PRICE,P.P_COLOR,P.P_SIZE,P.P_FILESRC, M.M_CASH FROM ORDER_MEMBER O LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON R.OM_CNTNUM=O.OM_CNTNUM LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.P_NO=O.P_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON O.M_ID= M.M_ID WHERE O.M_ID=#{param1} AND O.OM_STATE='구매확정' AND O.OM_CANCLE='N' AND R.R_CONTENT IS NULL ORDER BY O.OM_CNTNUM DESC

SELECT R.R_NO, O.OM_CNTNUM,O.P_NO,O.OM_STATE,O.OM_CANCLE, M.M_ID,R.R_TITLE,R.R_CONTENT,R.R_ID,R.R_RETITLE, R.R_RECONTENT,R.R_YNN,R.R_DATE,R.R_GROUP,R.R_FILESRC,R.R_SCORE, P.P_NAME,P.P_COLOR,P.P_SIZE,P.P_FILESRC FROM MEMBER M, REVIEW R, PRODUCT P, ORDER_MEMBER O WHERE M.M_ID=R.M_ID AND R.P_NO=P.P_NO AND R.OM_CNTNUM=O.OM_CNTNUM AND M.M_ID=#{param1} AND O.OM_STATE='구매확정' AND O.OM_CANCLE='N' ORDER BY R.R_GROUP DESC

SELECT O.OM_CNTNUM,O.OM_NUM,P.P_NO,O.U_CNT,O.M_ID, O.OM_DATE,O.P_PRICE,O.OM_STATE, R.R_CONTENT, P.P_NAME,P.P_PRICE,P.P_COLOR,P.P_SIZE,P.P_FILESRC FROM ORDER_MEMBER O LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON R.OM_CNTNUM=O.OM_CNTNUM LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.P_NO=O.P_NO WHERE O.M_ID=#{param1} AND O.OM_STATE='구매확정' AND O.OM_CNTNUM=#{param2} AND O.OM_CANCLE='N' AND R.R_CONTENT IS NULL ORDER BY O.OM_CNTNUM DESC

SELECT R.R_NO,R.M_ID,R.R_TITLE,R.R_CONTENT,R.R_ID,R.R_RETITLE, R.R_RECONTENT,R.R_YNN,R.R_DATE,R.R_GROUP,R.R_FILESRC,R.R_SCORE, P.P_NAME,P.P_PRICE,P.P_COLOR,P.P_SIZE,P.P_FILESRC, O.OM_CNTNUM FROM PRODUCT P, REVIEW R, ORDER_MEMBER O WHERE P.P_NO=R.P_NO AND R.OM_CNTNUM=O.OM_CNTNUM AND R.R_NO=#{param1} ORDER BY R_GROUP DESC
SELECT R_NO,M_ID,R_TITLE,R_CONTENT,R_ID,R_RETITLE, R_RECONTENT,R_YNN,R_DATE,R_GROUP,R_FILESRC,R_SCORE,P_NO FROM REVIEW WHERE R_NO=#{param1} ORDER BY R_GROUP DESC, R_STEP ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M, REVIEW R, PRODUCT P WHERE M.M_ID=R.M_ID AND R.P_NO=P.P_NO AND P_NAME=#{param1}
SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(R.R_SCORE),1),0) FROM MEMBER M, REVIEW R, PRODUCT P WHERE M.M_ID=R.M_ID AND R.P_NO=P.P_NO AND P.P_NAME=#{param1}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT O.OM_CNTNUM,O.OM_NUM,P.P_NO,O.U_CNT,O.M_ID, O.OM_DATE,O.P_PRICE,O.OM_STATE, R.R_CONTENT, P.P_NAME,P.P_PRICE,P.P_COLOR,P.P_SIZE,P.P_FILESRC FROM ORDER_MEMBER O LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON R.OM_CNTNUM=O.OM_CNTNUM LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.P_NO=O.P_NO WHERE O.M_ID=#{param1} AND O.OM_STATE='구매확정' AND O.OM_CANCLE='N' AND R.R_CONTENT IS NULL)

SELECT ROWNUM,R.* FROM ( SELECT P.P_NAME,P.P_NO,P.P_COLOR,P.P_PRICE,P.P_FILESRC,ROUND(AVG(R.R_SCORE),1) AVGSCORE FROM MEMBER M, REVIEW R, PRODUCT P, ORDER_MEMBER O WHERE M.M_ID=R.M_ID AND R.P_NO=P.P_NO AND R.OM_CNTNUM=O.OM_CNTNUM AND O.OM_STATE='구매확정' AND R.R_CONTENT IS NOT NULL GROUP BY P.P_NAME,P.P_NO,P.P_COLOR,P.P_PRICE,P.P_FILESRC ORDER BY AVGSCORE DESC, P.P_NAME DESC )R WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT ROWNUM, M.* FROM ( SELECT P.P_NAME,P.P_NO,P.P_COLOR,P.P_PRICE,P.P_FILESRC,SUM(O.U_CNT) AS CNTSUM,M.M_GENDER FROM MEMBER M, ORDER_MEMBER O, PRODUCT P WHERE M.M_ID=O.M_ID AND O.P_NO=P.P_NO AND O.OM_STATE='구매확정' AND M.M_GENDER='male' GROUP BY P.P_NAME,P.P_NO,P.P_COLOR,P.P_PRICE,P.P_FILESRC,M.M_GENDER ORDER BY CNTSUM DESC )M WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT ROWNUM, M.* FROM ( SELECT P.P_NAME,P.P_NO,P.P_COLOR,P.P_PRICE,P.P_FILESRC,SUM(O.U_CNT) AS CNTSUM,M.M_GENDER FROM MEMBER M, ORDER_MEMBER O, PRODUCT P WHERE M.M_ID=O.M_ID AND O.P_NO=P.P_NO AND O.OM_STATE='구매확정' AND M.M_GENDER='female' GROUP BY P.P_NAME,P.P_NO,P.P_COLOR,P.P_PRICE,P.P_FILESRC,M.M_GENDER ORDER BY CNTSUM DESC )M WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT ROWNUM,R.* FROM ( SELECT P.P_NAME P_NAME,ROUND(AVG(R.R_SCORE),1) AVGSCORE FROM MEMBER M, REVIEW R, PRODUCT P, ORDER_MEMBER O WHERE M.M_ID=R.M_ID AND R.P_NO=P.P_NO AND R.OM_CNTNUM=O.OM_CNTNUM AND O.OM_STATE='구매확정' AND R.R_CONTENT IS NOT NULL GROUP BY P.P_NAME ORDER BY AVGSCORE DESC, P.P_NAME DESC )R WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10
